text: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
author: Helen Keller

text: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you have imagined.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: Tis better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
author: Saint Augustine

text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
author: Lao Tzu

text: The unexamined life is not worth living.
author: Socrates

text: Keep looking upâ€¦ that is the secret of life.
author: Snoopy

text: Life is not about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
author: George Bernard Shaw

text: Life has no limitations, except the ones you make.
author: Les Brown

text: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
author: George Patton

text: Our life is frittered away by detail. Simplify, simplify.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: Life must be lived and curiosity kept alive. One must never, for whatever reason, turn his back on life.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

text: Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.
author: Mark Twain

text: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
author: Confucius

text: The greatest moments in life are not concerned with selfish achievements but rather with the things we do for the people we love and esteem.
author: Walt Disney

text: The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams.
author: Oprah Winfrey

text: Success is not about how your life looks to others. It is about how it feels to you.
author: Michelle Obama
